Package command

Class Summary
Command Base class of all commands.
CommandManager This class is a command manager for a set of commands.
History History command.
Redo Redo command.
Rotate Rotate the square by a specified number of degrees.
SetColor Change color of a square command.
Translate Translate a square command.
Undo Undo command.
